headline: CZR Q1 Earnings Call: Digital Growth and Regional Recovery Offset Profit Shortfall
summary: Hotel and casino entertainment company Caesars Entertainment (NASDAQ:CZR) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, with sales up 1.9% year on year to $2.79 billion. Its non-GAAP loss of $0.54 per share was significantly below analysts’ consensus estimates.
